name: Breakball Incremental
description:
A mix of Pinball, Breakout and Incremental. Combining what makes all three genres great. In development as you read this very text.

This game aims to include:

  • 2 Prestige Layers, filled with unique content!
  • At least 10 unique and fun balls!
  • A competitive mode, where you face against an AI in a race to break as much as possible!
  • Hundreds of unique cosmetic features, including things such as hats for ball!
  • And a story to top it off!

If you're interested in learning more about this project, please click this link, or join on the widget below!

News may or may not be posted, so be sure to keep in check!
